content: These ideas are really helpful, thanks! I actually just used some of the ingredients I got from Costco last weekend to make a big batch of pasta sauce, and I've been using it for lunch and dinner this week. By the way, I'm trying to stay on top of my budget and track my spending, and according to my app, I've spent around $250 on groceries in the past two weeks. Do you have any tips on how to reduce food waste and save money on groceries?
